name: Blazing Tundra
description:
Blazing Tundra is a Platformer Maze game in which you have to control a ball to escape the maze alive! Run, Jump, and roll around through the different levels, BLAZING and TUNDRA, to finally complete your adventure! This will not be an easy task however, the difficulty will scale as you get further into the maze. Only for brave adventurers!

CONTROLS

W - Forwards

A - Left

S - Backwards

D - Right

Left Shift - Boost

ESC or P - Pause Game

Spacebar - Jump (Only in 2nd Level)
